text: An extended stay hotel, apartel or serviced apartment building is a lodging establishment that rents hotel rooms or suites on a longer term basis than traditional hotels. They can make great alternatives to traditional apartment complexes as there's no lease involved, yet the units offer similar amenities to conventional apartments, such as kitchenettes so people can cook in their rooms instead of going to restaurants for every meal. Units in extended stay hotels usually rent by the week and communial facilities usually include a guest laundromat, conference rooms \ business centres, cafes, etc. Category:Hotels
title: Apartment hotel
